artist: Painter: After Johannes Voorhout; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: portrait bust in center oval; wearing long curly wig; white stock; turned slightly right and looking out at viewer; oval within an elaborate shield shape cartouche with paintings on either side, portrait on right and historical scene on left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet, below image in black: Ficquet Sc. / JEAN / VOORHOUT / ELEVE / DE JEAN VAN NOORT.  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-573
title: Jean Voorhout
